name: Xmas Night
description:
Game made for Cupsoft Games Jam 1 in 7 days

History:

Xmas Day is comming, but someone stole all the presents from the houses.

When everyone were look for then, a Storm has begun.

Only you can save the Xmas, keeping your temperature good or you could die from cold.

Commands:

 - Movent

- Move the Camera

 - Jump

Objectives:

- You must retreive all the 10 gifts, then go to the Tree

- Keep you temperature good by reaching the firepits to heat yourself

Gameplay:

Heating System

Away from the firepit

Running difference

Secrets:

If you are strugling with the game there's a command for you

- Place the arrow to closest objective
- To close the arrow bar (Shhh nobody is looking)

Secret Cup of Tea
